I have played this game and other CS games for years together now and am pleased to say the developers didn't disappoint at all.. It's not much different from the previous versions except for a few graphical advancements (which I love by the way). I needed to play on my 3 yr old laptop so I bought this game along with Global Offensive as a package which was well worth the price.

I recommend this game to anyone who:
1. Has a kinda old system which doesn't support the latest games
2. Has bought a PC recently but only for general purposes (PC which only has onboard graphics)
3. An official laptop in which you can occasionally play
4. Have friends who have any of the above machines and want to play CS with decent graphics

Hope this helps...
I have this game, it's so easy and this game give fun.
I love CS:GO, but this game is a weird mess of a game, with hard to find good servers, and bad support from valve

Better than CS:GO.

Counter Strike: Source
Dieses Spiel ist ein Teil meiner Kindheit, meiner Jugend. Es begann damit, dass ich meinen großen Brüdern dabei zusah. Dann, irgendwann holte ich mir selbst das Spiel. Dieses Spiel ist unter wenigen Shootern ein sogenannter Skill - Shooter. Nicht so wie bei CoD; CoD kann jeder Vollidiot zocken, man muss nicht mal Skill haben um darin gut zu sein. Bei CS:S lernt man das Aimen und Skillen. Gute CS:S Spieler erkennst du an ihrem Können, ihrem Skill. Selbst wenn es nicht mehr diesselbe Community wie früher ist, macht es auch heute noch einen rießen Spaß dieses Spiel zu zocken, eben auch zu der guten alten Zeiten Willen. Ich hoffe, dass das Leben wieder so einfach wird wie damals, wo die Menschen Guild Wars, CS:S und Halo gezockt haben. Holt euch dieses Spiel! Es lohnt sich zu 100%!

Easily one of the greatest multiplayer games in gaming history with a great community behind it all. The competitive dream might be over with this one in the trio series but mods what keeps this game alive. Out of all 3 of the CS games this one has by far the best mechanics & graphics for every kind of mod from bunnyhoping to surf, to zr and all the other minigame, pub and gg sv's spread out. This game has over 10yrs of user created content to satisify hours, even days or weeks of your time with enjoyment packed behind every corner. Some say this game is dead but I'd have to disagree with that statement; more content than ever before can you really say "this game can die?"
